format: Makefile fragment (or similar build script syntax)
description: A build configuration file defining variables, dependencies, inheritance of build tools, and file installation paths for an X application within the openembedded-core build system.

methods.name: inherit autotools
methods.description: Inheritance of autotools build system functions.
